body: So I don’t speak Japanese but I was curious. Considering that most of this artist’s work is wholesome I figured to search up if it had a continuation and it did. I found it and it doesn’t turn into ntr. Again I don’t speak the other language so I can’t really tell you what happens. But I have a rough translation of the last pages for each chapter. This chapter…. I actually forgot lol, but the other chapter it looks like they end up with each other after her mom maybe sister talks to MC. In the end, she says that the Mc was “perverted for the whole time since they were younger, but me too” and then ends. So no need to worry about this one, I think
I was almost certain the girl in the first scene and the senpai are the same person

Where's the defloration tag?!
So, why is the title change of heart? is seems like their feelings are mutual and haven't changed since their childhood to the point that they have their first time together. Is she gonna be married to a guy her parents wanted to?
I sense  NTR in the following chapter... i hope i'm wrong.
